CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 25, 1945, pg. 11, reads: "[left margin illegible] ...Dinner Party - Mrs. Arminita Montgomery ...Terrace was hostess at a lovely dinner ...her home, Tuesday night, honoring Mrs. ...Hurst and Mrs. Mary Wilson of Chicago, ...of Mrs. Emma Dukes, of Cherokee Street.  ...shown above, included, left to right: Mesdames Mary Wilson, Gladyce W. Beverly, Evelyn F. Dothard, Arminita Montgomery, Emma Hurst, Wanoeta Bates and Emma Dukes. The visitors were also entertained by Mrs. Corine Ward, Mrs, Waneeta Bates and Mrs. Gladyce Beverly during their stay. - Harris Photo.:
TitMainTitle: Mary Wilson, Gladyce W. Beverly, Evelyn F. Dothard, Arminita Montgomery, Emma Hurst, Wanoeta Bates and Emma Dukes gathered around dinner table in Montgomery home with china cabinet in background
